channel.title: Quotawarn on MOK's Onomatomaniske Kaos
channel.description: Recent content in Quotawarn on MOK's Onomatomaniske Kaos

item.title: Disk Quota Exceeded?
item.description: The disk quota system in Linux is quite old, and if you have a distributed workstation environment with NFS mounted shares it is not possible in a convenient way to inform users that they have exceeded their disk limits.
